### Example Application

All hypeR methods are compatible with R Shiny and can be incorporated into a variety of applications. For users looking to adopt hypeR in their own projects, we have created an example project using various hypeR methods in Shiny.

#### Live Demo
https://anfederico.shinyapps.io/hypeR-shiny

#### Open Source
https://github.com/montilab/hypeR-shiny

#### Help Requests
If you are looking to use hypeR in your own applications and need help or have questions on the implementation, please feel free to reach out to us!
